video.title: Dinotrux
video.synopsis: Half dinosaur, half construction truck, full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

episodes.synopsis: Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!
episodes.title: Ty and Revvit

episodes.synopsis: When Revvit and his Reptool friends wander out of their ravine, the Dinotrux must save them from a flock of wild Scrapadactyls.
episodes.title: Scrapadactyls

episodes.synopsis: The Dinotrux build a garage to keep the Reptools safe, but D-Structs tries to ruin their plans by turning the friends against each other.
episodes.title: Garage

episodes.synopsis: Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to save Ton-Ton, who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.
episodes.title: Scraptors

episodes.synopsis: D-Structs traps the Dinotrux in a deep sinkhole -- but he forgets about tiny Revvit, who comes up with a plan to help his much-bigger friends.
episodes.title: Pit

episodes.synopsis: Just as Ty Rux welcomes a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang sets out on a dangerous rescue mission.
episodes.title: Garby

episodes.synopsis: Under orders from D-Structs, Skrap-it steals one of Garby's parts, sending the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.
episodes.title: Desert

episodes.synopsis: The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and start causing chaos, painting everything in sight.
episodes.title: Tortools

episodes.synopsis: The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks. Ty Rux and the Reptools must find a way to save them.
episodes.title: Sandstorm

episodes.synopsis: When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.
episodes.title: Fake Ravine

episodes.synopsis: D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.
episodes.title: New Tail

episodes.synopsis: While exploring the site of a meteor crash, the Dinotrux meet a new band of helpful and friendly Reptools: Hex Wrenches who are all named Otto.
episodes.title: Ottos

episodes.synopsis: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but they need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.
episodes.title: Night

episodes.synopsis: When oozing tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux need a plan to herd the roaming Rollodons and pave over the sticky mess.
episodes.title: Rollodons

episodes.synopsis: D-Structs steals the gang's scrap metal panels to build himself a new lair, sparking a fight over the precious resource. Ty plans a clever rescue.
episodes.title: Lair

episodes.synopsis: Skya helps Ace figure out who stole parts from the garage, but when D-Structs traps the two sleuths in a cave they must build a way out.
episodes.title: Battering Ram

episodes.synopsis: Ton-Ton introduces his old crew, a trio of fellow Ankylodumps. They're so wild and crazy that the Dinotrux build them a racetrack just for joyriding.
episodes.title: Racetrack

episodes.synopsis: D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into believing that the Dinotrux are their enemies, resulting in a very sticky situation for the gang.
episodes.title: Gluphosaurs

episodes.synopsis: The Dinotrux and friends are delighted when Revvit maps a path to an enchanted forest, until the crew finds out it's inhabited by Towaconstrictors.
episodes.title: Towaconstrictors

episodes.synopsis: D-Structs plans to have the Desert Scraptors attack Ty and the crew, but everything changes when the Scraptors think Click-Clack is their leader.
episodes.title: Desert Scraptors

episodes.synopsis: The Flatirons is suffering a drought, so the Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring in needed water. D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.
episodes.title: Water

episodes.synopsis: A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage, but they have fun together all night -- until the food runs out and they must find an escape.
episodes.title: Wind

episodes.synopsis: When D-Structs' sidekick Skrap-It is struck by lightning, he suddenly becomes a genius with a foolproof plan to get rid of the Dinotrux.
episodes.title: Lightning
